title: Good app
review: A very decent app. Does the job pretty well. Hats off to them for delivering in my area not many apps do. The order so far is always accurate however they do take a lot of time sometimes and the food gets a little bit cold, and they are not accepting cash on delivery. I do not use use debit/credit card so now I can’t order which is very upsetting i would be very happy if they did COD. Overall a very good app. With few amendments definitely a 5 star

title: Scam!
review: I ordered my grocery at 2:15, and the driver whatsapp me at 3:05 the app didnt get my permission to share my contact info with the driver. Anyway first he requested me to list the order through whatsapp and I refused. Then one hour later at 4:07 he texted me pictures of different alternatives of my order, so I told him to skip the one that are not available. The he sent me his bank account number requesting for money!! I told him I will pay through the app he needs to submit the pill there but he told me that this is his first time using the app. So I volunteered to communicate with the to solve this issue so I captured their answer and sent it to him and he texted me back "WATCH OUT! IF YOU PAY THROUGH THE APP I WILL NOT GET MY MONEY!" i told him "but I thought this is first time with them how come you have this experience with them??" The  I requested the bill he paied. After that he sent me two pictures of my order and he told me to come and pick them up myself. When I reported this to the app and told the customer care specialists Yasmine she replied "the driver was trying to explain to you the process of payment through the app!!!!!!" Seriously, is this Yasmin calls me a liar. She didnt even bother herself to check the whatsapp conversation I sent to the her. PS this is my first and last time with the app since they share my location and contact information plus apparently they dont do background check.

title: Liars and worst customer service
review: I ordered from wakami on March 8 “woman’s day ironically” the sum turned up to be over 400 sr. A few minutes later, I get a call from the driver telling me that he’s at wakame but he doesn’t have enough cash on him to pay the sum, and asked if he could pass by and take the money then go get me the food. Hesitant but hungry I agreed, I haven’t used the app much prior so I didn’t know the system. He passed by, took 500 sr, and I’ve never heard from him again. I’ve been contacting hunger station since that day with no use. They even went as to take my bank information for transfer and promised that the sum is on its way and will be there within 21 days, Hehehehe jokes jokes... idk how such a big company can treat its customers in such a way. They talk a lot assuring you that “your complaint has been raised and being dealt with but as I said... jokes... it’s been over 4 months ... nothing ...

title: I do not recommend
review:
This app has many issues, technical and personal as well , first of all never deliver on time, never stick to given promised time. Regarding the personal , they always come to you directly on whats app asking to share location, knowing the app has your full details this is uncomfortable imagine the amount unknown numbers you will hVe . There are times where they don’t deliver the order at all, then you have to chase them in twitter otherwise they do not refund your money back , staff attitude is low, they deal with you in not friendly way, weak in arabic and english as well, no respect in dealing  , besides if you live in apartment they refuse to bring it up . Delivery cost is high knowing the app shows only near by restaurant and  still high . There is no customer service number, you get los whenever you have issue . 
Honestly one of the worst experiences

title: I WANT MY MONY BACK!!
review:
I ordered on the 16th of June and the payment was done by Apple Pay. A few minutes later, I am notified that the payment has failed, and when I pay again, I receive a text message of paying twice. Despite paying twice, the notification of the payment failure continues to appear, but the delivery representative informed me that the payment was made and there is no need to pay again and when I contacted the support for Hungerstation, the communication was initially easy, and after that there was no response and my money was not refunded. 

لقد طلبت يوم ١٦ يونيو وتم الدفعه من ابل بي بعد دقائق قليله يتم اشعاري بأن عملية الدفع قد فشلت وعند الدفع مره اخرى اتتني رسالة نصيه للدفع مرتين.وعلى الرغم من الدفع مرتين اشعار فشل عملية الدفع مستمر بالظهور ولكن اعلمني مندوب التوصيل بانه تم الدفعه ولا حاجه للدفع مره اخرى وعند التواصل مع الدعم لهنقرستيشن تم  التواصل بالبدايه بسهوله ومن بعد ذالك لم يتم الرد رغم تعاوني التام معهم  واموالي لم يتم استردادها.

title: I PAID TWO TIMES
review:
Bcs i sent my complaint and there’s no response from the customer service. I think it’s fine if i share my unpleasant experience yesterday.
I was order some foods from this app and i paid already trough apple pay, once the driver came he (he can’t speak english) asked me for the money, after i said that i’ve paid for it he started talking with arabic with the high tone voice, angry. And I didn’t understand what he said. He was insist not to leave. And at the end i gave the money so he can leave and I thought i will get my money back if i complain about this thing. Surprisingly the customer service only told me that they will call me later to return the money. And until now I received nothing. 
Please update your service quality and also the SOP regarding this issue..

title: Thieves, stole my money! Jahez is so much better!!!
review: This app is so terrible, I ordered from a restaurant and the app said that my order was approved and charged me money! Then about one hour later I got a message that the restaurant is closed and my money will be refunded in 21 WORKING DAYS!!! 21!!! That’s about a month long! Specially during this time you should update your list of available restaurants for the customers to avoid giving you money that you don’t seem to return to people from what I see on Twitter! Or at least if you don’t intentionally mean to steal customers money then why not do it like jahez and don’t charge the customers until the order is out for delivery. Also, since the time value of money is constantly changing, by the time you refund me my money will be worth less!!!

title: أسوأ برنامج توصيل طلبات في السعودية worst delivery in Saudi
review:
استخدمت البرنامج عدة مرات اثناء فترة الحظر وبعد الحظر. تطبيق عقيم ومعقد وخدمة توصيل سيئة جدا جدا وخدمة عملاء معدومة. طلب من كل ٣ طلبات عملتها من التطبيق توصلني ناقصة واضطر اجلس مع خدمة العملاء على الشات ساعات وكل مرة ما تتحل مشكلتي ولا ترجع فلوسي واضطر ارفع شكاوى لهيئة الاتصال وتقنية المعلومات. استغرب كيف ابل ستور يسمح لبرامج النصب هذي. 
I used this app multiple times during quarantine and in regular days. Very limited and complicated application, extremely poor delivery service and non-existing customer service. 
One order out of 3 would reach me missing items and I’d be forced to sit through the chat with their customer service but not once was my problem solved or my money reimbursed. I had to file official complaints with the CITC and ministry of trade. I honestly don’t understand how the App Store keeps this scam application live.

title: Good but needs enhancements
review: I ordered from store that sell coffee; but in the app only the food is listed. So the application is not flexible where the courier is in touch with the client since the order is confirmed. Also it’s not flexible as I chose my order from the list with the prices then had to fully pays it.. what if some of the order had finished.. there was no other way in the app to get back and edit the paid bill automatically. I think the customer in this case need to communicate customer service which is time and energy consuming for the customer to get his money back for this day to day encounters.

title: Don’t pay with credit-card
review: I literally had a problem with the delivery guy he closed the order and submitted it as reached to the customer and when I contacted them the technical support guy called him and he told him that he’s on site so he told me that but when i went to take my order he wasn't their and he came 30 min after when i told them to refund me the technical support told me to take it then complain thats its cold and he tried to force the order when i refused he made what they call a “ticket “ for them to contact me and I never got my money back and I realized that they were wasting my time till the time pass so i cant complain any more so if you wana order make sure you deal with cash with them

title: Faulty Application
review:
I have 2 delivery addresses added to my account. My home address is the default address. 
The driver delivered my order to my work address which I have not used in over 8 months. 

My previous orders have all been to my default address. However, with this new update, full of even more bugs directed the driver to deliver to my work. 

I checked my account and I am sure about my complaint.

After contacting the driver, I ended up having to pay the driver more money. At first he asked for 45 sr cash, then he settled on 25 sr.

I was at the driver’s mercy as HungerStation informed me that nothing can be done and that they would investigating the issue with their faulty application. 

The driver also informed me that HungerStation instructed him to mark the order as delivered and to leave my order at the location shown on the faulty app !

I will delete this app now since the customer service did not try to correct the issue or at least  refund the driver’s demanded delivery money. 

If you must use this app, pay cash only! 
Do not use a debit card or a credit card.

title: Bad service
review:
I have been using this app for a few years now. The problems: 1. They take he order then give you the delivery time which exceeds 1 hr 45 minutes sometimes. 2. Restaurants don’t respect the time. Most of the time the delivery is late. When delivery is late they call you. I don’t care if you call me. Get the delivery on time. 3. Recently I make the order, I don’t get confirmation and the application doesn’t allow me to cancel the order or even talk to someone. Just wait and after the wait is done I get a “failed” order.

Most recently they accepted the order. Charged the amount and it turns out the pharmacy was closed. Then they say it might take 21 days to get your money back.

title: Jahez is better
review: Unfortunately this app is garbage now. And The customer service is ridiculous, whenever i order the food is either very late, or the restaurant doesn’t accept the order. And when they finally accept the order it’s from a branch that is on the other side of the city, even though there is one right next to my house! And whenever you contact them they tell you they’ll get to the bottom of it and they just ignore it. I have a complaint that’s been under process for 5 months now and nothing. My advice to everyone, use jahez it’s more reliable and a better customer service. I hope HungerStation gets wiped from the market

title: Application chooses far away branches
review: Every time I order shawarma house the application chooses the branch 20 minutes away instead of the one that is 8 minutes away, even though the one 8 minutes away is closer. You cannot change order or cancel it because hunger station does not have that option, and it even does not have the option to call a support phone number, you are basically forced to eat cold shawarma. It’s the same case with some other restaurants. When you try to fill out their support ticket, it glitches and starts over. It is not even possible to message hunger station telling them anything.

title: Worst service 0 star
review:
This is the worst food delivery application there is no proper way to communicate with customer care and in my location there are only around 15 restaurants and still the order is not assigning to any Driver because everyone are busy . I better say close your service in Wadi Dawasir . And also if the order is placed successfully it take around 1 hr to deliver the food ., in this time I can got to that restaurant and can collect the order by myself such a waste of time and money

Just close this application such a worst app 
If there are no driver then just keep your app inactive instead of making us wait for the order

title: No option of cancellation
review:
It wont tell you how much time u have to wait, and if u try to cancel within 1-2 minutes, it will tell you that you cannot cancel anymore. The app’s online help is no help at all, they will just apologize but still they cant do anything. I waited one hour for the. Delivery of the saadeddin cake, and i tried to cancel it after i saw that i have to wait for 1.5 hours, i tried to
Contact their online support and make a ticket but it is not working, then i email them, twice, both of  agent’s answers are the same, sorry but we cant cancel. Better use carriage or talabat. Hunger station is a bogus

title: Good to bad to the worst
review:
I’ve been using the app since its launch,
I’m sad to say that the hungerstation team seems to have lost interest in customer service and apparently are using drivers that don’t speak neither Arabic or English. I have had about half a dozen delivery problems, actually one time one of the carriers insulted me, and no help from customer service. 
I’m glad that there are many applications that do what hungerstation used to do, deliver food with a professional manner. 
If my review means anything, work on your customer service and try to hire better carriers that speak one of the  two dominant languages in Saudi Arabia.

title: This application is wasting of time
review:
For my first use of this application i made an order and it was so slow also freezing, I cancelled the order , after half hour one of there men called me to collect the order , I refused to collect at the beginning, but he told me that this application will not give him his money back and he is poor man , so I collected to not harm him . 

So u should fix these problems: 
- make the application faster . 
- you have to put easy cancellations button instead of calling the call center ( by the way they answer so late and they should train the CS stuff to be professional)

title: Do not order through this app
review:
Seriously it is the worst app ever. The experience is so frustrating you never know if your order will be delivered or not. 
I have been waiting for my breakfast for more than 2 hours and a half!!! 
No response from customer service. Restaurant number provided by them is wrong. No one is answering
Use another app for your own sake.

title: Bad service
review:
Cancellation of orders without any notification and without call from service center until you complain, all they had to say is that "we will refund you" and we added some tiny amount of money to your wallet !! Seriously? Is that what should handle the issue? Will avoid using this app in the future! Let this money in the wallet rot !

Update: the developer in their reply are asking me to contact the service center, didn't I mention that I already did? Some serious English language issues here !

title: Order not refunded
review: My experience here is really bad. I am trying to refund my money because my order was not delivered but the amount was deducted from my card. I have received email from support service asking screen shots on all my transactions including the bank receipt. Until now no response from HungerStation. It’s been two months now. SO BAAAD!!!

title: Quality is trending down
review:
Service quality became bad. Drivers and customer service are slow

The guy who responds to reviews need to check the system before responding. I can attach more than 10 different cases of bad attitude of drivers, weak and unprofessional response by customer service. This app became very bad after his success. Developers must remember that individual drove their success and now can drive their closure.

Check your system better than just copy paste ready made responses. I can share the evidences and you need to respond in public. Are you interested in that??

title: App works opposite
review: First of all, the app charges 3.75 riyal to activate you bank card. Secondly, offers and discounts on the vary and depends. Third, which is most important; you can’t change you’re order unless the restaurant receive it then it tells you oh your order been submitted so we can’t. You guys better work on the app and develops more information and options, so customers would know what they be able to do. Moreover, delivery prices have to be considered every once in a while + customer services and call centers to cut the issue before you loss many of them.

title: Good app worst customer service
review: The app is good to order foods. But they cheat using promotions. I recently got a promo saying 30SR will be credited to my wallet if i order 3 times from 21-27 Feb. I order thrice as per promo and till date no amount credited. And when i tried to contact the Customer support first it was automated reply that they will solve the issue in 4 Hrs then it became 24 hrs then its almost a week the same msg is being shown in my support tickets. No support person contacted. I aint after the 30 SR because i spent almost 150 SR for my 3 orders. But this review is for others to know how their promos are.

title: Terrible, terrible app
review: Hey, you’re looking through the reviews, seeing whether to download this terrible app. Don’t. Don’t waste your time on this terrible app. Don’t waste your money on this app. With no support, HungerStation can’t guarantee your order at all. They don’t offer well written descriptions for items, don’t carry some items at all, and the restaurants are edible at best. Their support is NONEXISTENT! Use Uber Eats, Careem Now, and Talabat. They all have great customer support and they actually help you through problems when something goes wrong. Don’t bother, and keep scrolling.

title: This app is just horrible
review: In the beginning, everything was fine, but for some reason, every time I order, something is missing from my order. When I complain to Hunger station about it, they say they are sorry and add money to my wallet. At first, I told myself it's the restaurant's fault. Still, it happens a lot that I'm starting to doubt it's the drivers that steal my food since this problem doesn't happen when I use other apps like Jahez hunger station should look into this problem; I won't use this app ever again.

title: Bad Customer service
review: This app is good to order but when it comes to customer service they are really bad. I had an issue so I sent them an email in their application and they said they will come back to me in 4 hours but  three days pass and no answer. Then when I talked with me in Twitter with customer care they told me to talk with them in their app I told me I used the app and when I explained to them they promised me they will get back to me and till this day nothing. Problem wasn't solve didn't get any answer so I uninstalled their app.

title: Missing restaurants and opening timings
review:
Some restaurants aren’t available in the list, even though they are present near my location. Also, some restaurants are closed when I want to order from them and it doesn’t say when they are going to open.
Everything else, perfect 👌🏻😍

title: COD
review: Generally good but hard to reach out to customer service compared to other similar apps. And a suggestion, bring back the cash on delivery option. Currently we can use cash in the actual restaurant and also other apps have that option now ..so I don’t see the point ..

title: Unreliable
review: I made a big order, after an hour and 45 min with no food delivery I contacted the customer service, they called and said they will fix it, and marked the problem solved, I wrote to them again after another 15 min of no delivery, they said exactly the same thing, promising me it will be delivered within the next 10 min, now they marked the order as delivered, and problem solved, and I still didn’t get my order, you are a big joke, unreliable, and I will never deal with you again, I happily deleted your app.

title: Delivery
review:
Most of you driver they don’t understand ho to deliver I’m paying money for delivery and at the end I’m the one who’s going out to search them,
Why I’m a paying for delivery if every time I’m going out to search them wile my house it at the street, this is the second time I’m suffering with your drivers and Inshallah this is the last time for me to order from HungerStation.
Baddest treatment ever .
I’m buying by my money and payment for deliver to get better service but at the end I’m getting shout at from the drivers. This is shame on you

title: Orders take too long and customer service is HORRIBLE
review:
Thats right. It takes on avg 10min for orders to get accepted and there is no direct contact by phone to customer service only chatting and IT IS HORRIBLE! They can end the chat whenever they want and dont respond well and adequately it is terrifying if you have a problem with the delivery of your food and you have to reach out to customer service because they will always disappoint you. Terrible App dont use it stick with Careem or ANY other app.
Never Again HungerStation.

title: Unreliable, slow, always missing items/wrong orders
review: I’ve been using the app for a couple years, and I’ve had countless orders delivered late. Almost certainly your order will not be delivered in the given time. There’s always something wrong... missing item, exceeding delivery time, or the worst you wait an hour just for them to inform you it has been canceled because there’s no drivers and then you’re stuck hungry looking for another app. Try others or take your chances with your hunger!

title: The application has been deleted ,because he deserves less than a star ✅.
review:
Bad application, more than once the same problem occurs to me (‏wrong order or missing ) due to the application itself because the restaurant itself says that it was not in this number or this type.

The solution to their problem is to return the money to the wallet in the application (as if they did not solve the problem).

 The application has been deleted ,because he deserves less than a star ✅.

title: Not reliable
review: It’s like playing Russian roulette with this app I ordered at 6:30 today and it’s almost 9:00 I opened a ticket at 7:55 with no response I tried to call the restaurant to know where the food I ordered 3 hours ago is and no response from the restaurant as well this app is not reliable you’ll get missing orders which they’ll just add the money for the orders in your wallet that money has an expiration date they won’t refund it so basically you’ll have to use the app again or lose your money worst app

title: Customer service needs a lot of improvement and care
review: I have specified in my orders that, I have Celiac Disease (which is a disease that causes my immune system to attack my small bowel which leads to serious effects) and is also identified as allergy to gluten. I have specifically indicated that in some of my orders and requested no buns or breads in my burgers with my allergy to wheat (gluten product). However it was neglected and when I filed a complaint they totally ignored my request twice in different occasion, despite the awareness . So be careful and thank you

title: Terrible, unreliable service
review: Downloaded the app and signed up only to be disappointed from the first try..placed an order, was charged for it but after 20 minutes I received a notice that my order could not be fulfilled.. my order was for ready made donuts not something extravagant. They did refund the charge after a few days, but still first time users should not experience this ridiculous lack of service. Will delete and not look back

title: Great service just bad drivers sometimes
review: The service in general is great, in terms of qaulity of restaurants available and tracking of the delivery. But sometimes they hire drivers who can’t speak Arabic nor English. These drivers usually delay the delivery because of their lack of communication skills and not understanding how to read instructions.

title: Connection Issues & Delivery Prices
review: Service is very good but many times I face a problem in connection which leads to close the order due to unknown reasons, but anyhow it ok only I have issue with the delivery rate for some restaurants it’s showing high price compared to the prices of the menu, and I noticed some items in different Resturant’s you guys increased the prices of the item itself

title: Worst delivery app ever
review: After 1 hour from applying my order and paid online. Afterword a delivery guy messaged me and said the shop is closed, sure i told the delivery guy that I applied one hour ago, he responded with ( i just got the request now ) like what!!!!!!!!.. now it has bein 3 hours and my order is still on preparing stage! Tried to contact the support team in app and twitter there’s no responses; i dont really recommend this app to anyone. its one of the worse app experience I’ve ever had and i don't wish anyone to face it.

title: Location Problem.
review: Several time select the location but each time its change the location to 100m far. Need to fix the location services for accurate location.

title: Terrible customer service
review: Wouldn’t recommend this app to any one I ordered any order and never received it plus they wouldn’t refund me the amount i paid if your think of a food delivery application try Marsool or Careem this app has really gone bad

title: Excellent Performance but
review: If delivery guy call to the customer and they see any other requests just in case it will be much better or if the delivery guy calls the customer just to have a or any other requirement it will be much  better

title: Worst customer service
review: This is not an exaggeration, I’ve never dealt with such rude customer service before, straight up ignores the complaint and reply with a not sufficient action and hang up on you before you even reply wither or not you were satisfied. This happened multiple times with different agents, will never use the app again.

title: They close complain tickets without resolving the issue
review:
I received a totally wrong order and paid for the delivery charges. When I complained, they closed the ticket without resolving the issue or refund me. Finally, they are not allowing me to raise another ticket on the application. Totally unprofessional and taking advantage of the Covid-19 curfew. I will delete the application and never use it again.
Wish if there was a “zero star” because that’s what they deserve as an evaluation. One star is too much.

title: Good but hate the Manipulation
review:
Seeing the total cost of ordered colored in green which is manipulative. Its not ethical. This way of unethical tricks can be seen in many places in the app. I wish this app stop tricking or manipulation and uses better healthy tactics.

Also, the customer service live chat and the idea of you have to be waiting to be answered is a way to discourage you from raising complains or issues. This is a NASTY way to solve customer complains load. 

Totally this app executives needs lessons in manners and ethics.

title: The worst of the worst
review:
This app does employee the worst driver and the worst customer service,

While the driver refuses to deliver the food to my place at the mall and he consisted that I go out to his car at the end of the parking to take my food which was paid for. After I did go to take the food he showed me the message from the customer service saying if the customer didn’t come to the car he should leave. I believe this app take the lead in the worst apps ever

title: They became so big and full now that they can lower customer care standards without issues
review:
If the driver is late or if the restaurant accepts the order and the driver cannot enter the restaurant because they are closed for prayer or anything else You cannot complain about that anymore, also even before when you CAN complain the first thing they do is give you some compensation in your wallet before even handling the problem.

NO HungerStation some people care about quality first, some people don’t want to talk to the delivery guy if he is the base of the problem.

Yes you can have a big inventory of restaurants and a lot of customers.

But don’t forget there is something called competition.

I will not use this app anymore

Deleted

title: Better connection
review: One of the best app for food delivery food but need to improve the communication center when we have problem in our orders because it become very difficult

title: Misbehving staff, no customer support, expensive delivery charges
review: (KSA) Please try and avoid using this app and ordering using it. A recent experience, bad behavior of (delayed) delivery guy with food items missing from the package and seal broken. All hints points towards involvement of that misbehaving delivery (local) guy here in KSA. Wrote a complaint, and it dropped on deaf ears of the so called customer service. Neither my money was refunded nor anybody contacted me to apologize. Use other delivery apps to avoid such incidents.

title: They are so bad at everything
review:
They are not allowed to take my money until they give the food to me. They’re taking more time to deliver the order at least for 2 to 3 hours !! 

When I order and my order is missing something I call them and they told me that they will put it in my wallet I don’t want it in my wallet I want to them to give me my money back from where they take it from.

They are baaad I am going to delete the app..!

title: The truth about this app
review: This app has many problems and I think all the five star reviews here are mostly fake, they have a timer for when your food arives but it’s useless it doesn’t mean anything an usually runs alout long before your food arrives, another problem is if the resturant you ordered food from forgets a part of your order or does something wrong they simply tell you to “give them a bad review” and present no compensation

title: Cheating
review: I had 68 sar in my wallet out of which 48 sar was to expire on 4th June. It was credited on 1st June. It was mentioned expiry date 4th June. I checked on 4th morning to see and order as it was the last day my money has already expired at morning itself. When contacted with customer care they said it can’t be refunded upon arguing they say it was only for 72 hrs. Can’t they clearly mentioned expiry in 72 hrs why do u mention date then. Such cheating is ridiculous. Very hungry for money you seem to be.

title: The worst app ever
review:
I tried this app several times during several years , they always late or didn't arrive 

Last order in 28 March 2020 arrived after 80 minutes even though i order prepared sandwiches from bakery away only 2.1 kilometers also not what i order , my order checkin and i had tuna with eggs!!!

Also they has no call center !! U can raise a technical ticket in the app , and when u try to raise the ticket it refuse and appears an error

title: You R Amazing
review:
I like your App updates
especially if I need to cancel an item I can do it write in a much easier way and I don’t have to go to the payment phase and cancel it from there 

Keep on being super 💪🏻🥰

title: Bad management
review: They can’t manage their drivers, the driver take long time to deliver my order, I received the food very cold because the driver is far away from the restaurant and my location, I think he take another order which is not acceptable, the customer service response is simply (sorry), this is the 2nd bad experience with this application although there is another applications better than this.

title: For the Drivers
review: I have encountered many drivers who does not speak english at all. The app is great but somehow, they should also make make that the drivers could commincate well to the customers.

title: Hungry station is thief
review:
Before 5 days ago, I ordered for dinner and I paid 66SR then after 10 minutes the app said failure in payment. While they already took my money, I tried several times to contact them they don't respond and I lost my money. I don't recommend you using this app. I swear that I will never ever use it again. 

قبل 5 أيام طلبت للعشاء ودفعت 66﷼ وبعد 10 دقائق التطبيق يقول العمليه مرفوضه. مع انهم اخذوا فلوسي كنت اراسلهم وما يردون وخسرت فلوسي. ابدا لا تستخدموا التطبيق. واقسم اني ما راح استخدمه مره ثانيه.

title: Don’t bother
review:
I have used this app several times but each time it was terrible. First time tracking showed it has been delivered and actually didn’t get my order.
Second time order was incomplete and they told me encha Allah next time. Third time order was late more than an hour and when I wanted to cancel the driver told me to pay. They have no commitment no responsibility I told them that and it was deleted for good.

title: Intrusive notifications and privacy concerns
review: Very intrusive app when it comes to notifications it sends you (even if you turn them off in the app) and the personal data it requests from you. I do not recommend this app as its developers have such a disregard of customer privacy and convenience. Plus it is annoying and they usually just cancel your order after an hour or so pass.

title: The worst application and the worst service in the world
review: I advise everyone not to use this app, always delay , the worst captains , worst customer service ever, you couldt reach the call center , all what you can do is to open a ticket and they promise that they will contact you. You pay online and they deduct the money, then you see that your order is delivered and you receive nothing. !! And you couldnt contact anyone after that.. THE WORST !!!

title: Works one time out of ten
review:
If you using this app on daily basis I’m pretty sure that you faced many problems, starting from canceling orders without notice , delaying way more than the estimated time , drivers are picking your order and going somewhere else , till the refund which takes many days.
In the other hand I’m 100% sure that if u tried any other delivery app you will find it better than this one

title: This app in not good
review: I ordered food from this app first the driver is 1 hour late then they tell me that they are changing drivers then 40 minutes later they canceled the order they are unbelievable

title: Unprofessional, liars, waste of time and MONEY
review:
18 Feb 21
I add this company are thieves and idiots I don’t recommend it at all take care waste of money time worst delivery captains worst customer service ever 

THE WORST EVER. SCAMMERS. THIEVES

Unprofessional, putting a button for leave at door while phone call and confirmation is required despite payment is done then end up with order cancellation WITHOUT money refund
liars, upon requesting customer service support they call center knows nothing. Nothing means NOTHING 
waste of time and MONEY: Making another order does not guarantee you will receive your order. They take money again then apologize. So why accepting the order from the beginning. FIRST TIME TO SEE APP WITHDRAW MONEY THEN CHECK IF RESTAURANT IS READY OR NOT IF NOT SO YOUR MONEY IS WASTED

title: Location system
review: Very good service so far except when I am in hospital compound. 99% of the driver will be lost. Somehow they cannot navigate well with the location system. I wish this can be rectify for improvements. Thank you.

title: Poor Customer Support
review:
Unfortunately an app like this does not provide any kind of customer support to its users not even one phone line to call if you need to contact anyone for help. Even the poorly designed customer support form that does not work for a long time now takes you to a site that says we are sorry something went wrong. 
I will not use this application again!

title: Great app for competitive prices
review: I used to have not a very good experience with this app but now I believe it’s has such efficient and great service. Fast delivery and I believe the value proposition they have is the good delivery prices and promotion codes.

title: Hygiene
review:
Unfortunately some of the drivers have zero hygiene and disgusting
They need to know they are working in food industry and hygiene is the most important thing here
Last time for my delivery, the driver delivered my order very late and there were 3 more people riding with him in his car with my order between their legs 
So disgusting and decided I would rather sleep without dinner than ordering from hungerstation again

title: Mohamed Yousif
review:
The app overall isn’t too bad - delivery is easy and usually goes smoothly. 
However the customer service is very poor and probably the worst I saw from any delivery apps - the chat agents show no empathy and barely listen to complaints - they just give vague answers like “it won’t happen again” and some of them even become aggressive

title: I love it 😍
review:
The App is really good. 
I especially love the in-App feature “Track Driver”, “Chat with Driver” and “Call Driver” because it helps me estimate how soon my order will arrive. 
Rating for each restaurant and the rider is separate within the App.

title: The best offers
review: This app is really good with offers and choices of restaurant but they have a porblem which is they take long time to deliver, but other than that it’s a great app and I will order from them next time for sure

title: Don’t download it’s a scam
review:
After I been a loyal customer who order 2-3 times a day and spending thousands today I ordered pastries and on one of them I added flafel and the app automatically added flafel to all my orders and it ruined breakfast

 I contacted support and he told me “do a better job and be more careful next time, anything else?”

I immediately unlinked my device and deleted the app. Waste of money and trash costumer service.

title: A practical App
review:
Awesome app, easy to use and friendly. 
Great new options every time. The shipping and the delivery are making great progress with time.

Prices are decent and so much different restaurants.

title: Payment problem,
review:
I ordered from HungerStation and the money been paid then the restaurant didn't expect my order, so i had to wait 2 weeks to have my money back! It shouldn't even withdraw the money before the restaurant accept the order!

Needs to be improved,

title: Worst app
review: This app was one of the best applications. Recently the service ms provided in this app is bad. Takes an hour to approve an order while they already took the money from the account. At the end it will be canceled and I have to wait few days to get the money back. Then another hour for the driver to reach me because he was given multiple orders at the same time. I’m deleting this app for ever.

title: Location
review: The tracking is not accurate  and sometimes I get wrong order

title: Double order resturant
review:
Today when i ordered from this resturant there was also other resturant which was next to this resturant and i wanted to order other food as well .. 

My question 
Why don't you have such an option to develop your service that the ability to order double order in the same request in condition of when the two resturant is near by ? Hope this finds well!

Thanks and wish all the best

title: Theft
review: Once I ordered from hunger station and paid with card and the driver tricked me and took my money and order, it was almost 2 AM and we called the driver when he submitted that the delivery was done and asked him where he was, he said he gave the food to the maid, we don't have a maid. I couldn't get a hang of the company and texted them in tweeter but no good response, I didn't get my money refunded back and that was so disappointing.

title: Do not download this app
review:
This ad is worse they liars and they stole my money every I called them today to get back my money they didn’t answer me
Do not download this app thank you

title: Not the best
review:
1. Claims free delivery at the start and ends up charging when we check out. Most of the times. 
2. Allows to make order , take payment and then you get calls saying we don’t have that. 
3. Just an apology does not work when you make a customer wait for 3 hrs and then tell them your order is cancelled. 
4. I can understand during tougher times things are not easy , but you guys being professionals in this field is not an excuse. 
5. Do not show products that cannot be delivered. And strict action has to be taken with your suppliers also. 
You make a customer wait for 2-3 hrs and then cancel the order , what do you expect them to do at that time.

title: Bad Drivers and slow costumer service
review:
I paid my order via visa card but when the driver delivered my order, he insisted on taking cash. He said i can just call costumer service for the refund of my money, even refusing to give my order without giving him the cash. 

I called the costumer service to help me settle this matter and they assured me a refund. It has been more than a week, no refunds, no replies.

title: Trustworthy app
review: Can trust this app, they used give codes before which was fascinating and made this app more interesting. I hope they start giving us codes for foods more often back again.

title: Extremely bad service and a total ripoff
review: No refund. I have 2 orders which were never refunded. The delivery is to a hotel and the coverage is bad, instead of giving the order to the receptionist they cancelled the order and did not refund me. The location was clear to both delivery guys and this issue was raised to support multiple times without resolution. I don’t recommend using HungerStation at all.

title: Failure to provide food
review: I ordered food through card payment and waited for the time they specified. But just after the time period they cancelled my order and refund. Don’t expect them to deliver the food you ordered. They will cheat you. If you are hungry and need food just try other services, they are more trustworthy. They don’t even reply properly to the complaint. Big waste of time. Worst service ever

title: Unreliable
review: You always end up waiting and waiting for nothing. Your order keeps getting canceled for no reason and without notifying you. Drivers usually deliver a couple of orders and your order is not fresh by the time you get it. But most importantly there no easy way to get customer support. There’s no phone number for customer support. Use jahez instead.

title: This app is amazing
review: I have ordered twice with this app and it didn’t have any problems or came late the food is great and over all Easy to use

title: Worst good delivery app in saudi
review:
This is one of the worst app when it comes to customer care . 

- they deduct your money before they even send your food order to the restaurant and that will make you struggle if the restaurant did not accept your order for any reason . 

- to cancel the order due to delay in delivery is almost impossible. 

- order has to be canceled automatically from the app after 2 HOURS . 

- customer care is one of the struggle things you have to deal with . 

- Refunding the money will take more than they mention in the app especially if it is credit cards, it will be weeks  . 

By far im not ordering again from them.

title: Vision.
review:
Review? HungerStation needs to do more , we have a chance to change the narrative, to do what others are not doing.
We need to create a service that others follow, emulate and  aspire to replicate.

title: Location issue
review: The app keeps forgeting my location so I select the location everytime I use the app. Please fix this issue.

title: Must be better
review: There are always mistakes from the restaurant, drivers and the application sometimes. For sure the application is the only responsible about that. And drivers lately come late and the food is not hot enough because of the delay. I like the app but it’s not the only one now so it must improve the service.

title: My opinion to hungersation
review: I really enjoy it but some of the drivers are in polite there should be a quick review about him directly after the delivery  and prices are high and we want offers

title: Nice service
review: Nice service but always not completed as the drivers asking us to come down in front of the building even if we request left beside door and telling this is the rule ?!

title: Not up to standard in resolving customers issues
review:
Many times i get wrong orders and the only thing i get, is to give back the exact money for the wrong item 
They don't care if you want to have right order again or not so if you want to have it you need to pay again and cover minimum order requirement, delivery charges, vat,etc...

title: Disappointed!
review:
Am chocked honestly!
It was the best app ever in it’s field but now they are getting worse and worse while competitors are getting better gradually!
Tracking not accurate as it was, price of delivery is not responsible anymore with present competitors, delivery stuff not professional enough.
Your app has been left to better one,
Hope u get back in track

title: Veryyy poor customer service
review: I ordered twice on different occasions, both orders got cancelled , first one was last april, it was never refunded!! Now again this day june 7th, order got cancelled again!!!! And im no longer expecting a refund since the first one was never refunded!!!! Pooorrrrr servicccceeee, very upsetting system! You should add a card on hand payment scheme if you keep on cancelling orders!!!!! To sum this all up “STOP STEALING!!!!”

title: Suggestion
review:
Dear HungerStation,

I’d like to thank you all for providing a great service to all of us. Your efforts are highly appreciated.
I’d also like to refer to the fact that you’ve earned those five stars indeed.
My only suggestion is you to provide the ability to expand the description of the items shown in each store so that we can fully understand what is it.

Nevertheless, you’re a trustworthy.

Yours truly,
Tawfeeg Ghonaim

title: Bad experience
review: This is my first time writing a review in App Store. However, this is one of the worst delivery apps I’ve ever used. The technical support is the worst ever. I have placed an order and it took me more than 2 hours to get it. I called the place I ordered my need, and asked them about my order and they told me we haven’t received it yet from HungerStation. I DO NOT recommend this app for anyone.

title: Review
review: Pls read some added comments in the order so that you will know whats is added or lessen in the order

title: 2 bad experiences
review:
Too late to arrive 
No HONESTY when you have me pay in advance for a driver to buy from stores then you don’t send him nor recoup the money!

title: Worst customer service
review: It has to be the worst app ever, the customer service is so useless and unsupported at all, in-fact the way they communicate is worst. There are way better apps than HungerStation. The order system is way too complex, in order to know what you’re ordering you have to check twice. I wouldn’t recommend this app.

title: Worst delivery app ever
review:
I’ve used this app many times, none of the orders show up on time, and the worst thing an the app is if u wanna pay with ur credit or apple pay u must pay it once u submitted the order. 
If the driver was late which is the most common thing in this app, or he didn’t show up,  u r gonna wait wait for a couple of days to refund the money. NO MORE HUNGER STATION

title: It’s hard to call your agents
review: All is good. I love it. But when there’s a problem, it’s not easy to contact your agents. Please have a number or a quick request to get contacted. Thanks

title: Worse delivery experience
review:
No customer serves 
Worse delivery ppl they don’t speak Arabic or English . They ask you for your location twice in app and privately and it’s not okay . Took my driver an hour to get from a restaurant 5 min away from my house and customer serves wasn’t any helpful and it seamed like they don’t care either  deleting this stupid app and stupid company

title: Time issue
review: Its take to much time than usual and than other order food application

title: Ahmed
review:
After 1 hour then waiting i found message from them ( We're unable to accept your order just now. Try again in a couple minutes.
In case you paid online, you will receive refund SMS within 15 minutes
- HungerStation )

title: KSA
review: It’s really sad that the app doesn’t support IOS 10 anymore... i can no longer order anything since yesterday

I ordered from Hardee’s then the order says that it’s delivered in the app…but I didn’t get it, then after I contacted support I got my order but when I got my order I found a peice of hair in it and the bread was so dry so I contacted the customer service after 25 minutes of chatting with the customer service agent they ended the chat without giving me a refund.

title: Uninstalled just after this review
review:
update your junk application, there aren’t any free delivery offers under your “free delivery” section.
Also, i noticed that you have increased the prices of the menus of some restaurants (not counting delivery fee).

If you want better delivery service with better support, try careem or any other app. Otherwise this app is awfully terrible

title: Please stop with you’re ads or I’m actually going to delete the app
review:
For god’s sake stop with the ads and notifications + marsool is match better.
The way I see this is to stop letting anybody be a driver because some people literally just scam other for 10-15 riyals and sometimes 500+
I don’t want to be a Karen but for god’s sake do something right with your app.

title: Cannot update with iOS 12💔
review: Disappointed update! Does not compatible with iOS 12.5, how about those mobile iphone6 , same me, we cannot use your apps. Actually at first 4 yrs of using your service it was good until this month u made an update which I cannot use it all.. be considerate some who are using old iphones😑.

title: Terrible app and services
review:
Terrible app, terrible service! when they brought me one product instead of another, I wrote in support and I received an answer to my email only after a few days, and then! the answer was in Arabic, and I wrote to them in English, I have never experienced such poor service and communication with clients. The food always arrives cold and not tasty, there is no one to complain to, the restaurant cannot be rated, discount codes do not work! I do not understand how such rubbish was allowed to work! HungerStation Your app need a good check from the government of Saudi Arabia! Shame! 
Edit

Delete
Share
P

title: Mmm
review: It’s so good and I love it so much but it’s little expensive but it’s so good . If you have this app you need to try the joker it’s so good and I love it so much and I wish you all have a nice day 😣👏🏻🦋

title: Worst App Ever
review:
This App is the worst everything about it
The drivers, customers service & the way paying specially here in Saudi Arabia 
I don’t know when they will fix these problems 
And When I’m using Apply pay why I should pay before I receive my order this wrong, many times I received my order late or wrong
And if I want to use wallat they will not cut it from the total price , you have to have the all amount 😶
Even the one star I give it to you is to much 👎🏻

My bill was 72 riyal but the order I received is for 56 riyal so there is 16 riyal difference 
And the customers service no response 
It’s unfair

title: WORST DELIVERY APPLICATION ❗️
review: 🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺🔺 The worst delivery application for many reasons such as: 1- Product quality at the time of arrival. 2- Product heat or cold you get. 3- The delegates are generally treated poorly. 4- Bad customer service. 5- The value of the applications themselves is more expensive than the rest of the applications. 6- Delivery value is more expensive than other applications.

title: It will be better with less delivery charge
review: A great app for delivery, sadly not all stores in my district appears and the cost of delivery is a bit high, great app though.

title: Bad app
review: I ordered from restaurant steak and they dont have an option for how you want it cooked so i received one big charred rock cant be eaten so instead of Compensation me i received an apology what a let down new update, after reaching to their customer Money first i got we still working on it dont use this scam app

title: Too expensive delivery
review: The delivery is more expensive than the actual food. This is not fair, I almost order the food but then I see the price for the delivery and cancel. Please lower the prices, many many of my friends see this same problem. If you fix this, I and many people like me would be regular customers.

title: Order reported as delivered while not
review: No response from the support , I have an order that was reported as delivered after waiting for more than 2 hours till all restaurant closed and no response for the raised ticket. Payment has been placed online for unreliable service. This will be my last time to use this fragile application.

title: Great app
review: Easy to use , a lot of options, all items have pictures and descriptions

title: Thank you for your service
review: Very professional service thank you

title: DO NOT USE THIS APP
review:
Service had become worst
They first accept the order and take the money and after 30 minutes the cancel the order "We are temporarily unable to accept your order at the moment. We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again in a few minutes"
And the refund they are making in 21 days.

DO NOT USE THIS APP

title: I never received my order on time !!
review:
A minimum of 2 hours waiting for the order. The driver doesn’t answer through the chat its just  useless feature added to the app. 

Every time i asked my self to give them a chance maybe there is an improvement in their service but its not.

title: Bad surprise
review: I’m a sick person that can drive because of my sickness. I ordered food from Hanger Station, and I waited for 50 minutes. It was the expected time to receive my order. They send me a message. Sorry, we canceled your order; try again after a few minutes. They really made me, wife my child, unhappy.

title: Bad timing
review:
I left the app for a very long time, and I came back after almost a year with the same issues nothing changed at all.

Once you submit the order, they will get the payment 1st and screw you customer! Wait like a worthless piece of crab until god knows when then they deliver your order.

title: Worst delivery service ever
review:
Never on time and always late. Drivers don’t know how to use google maps and very unprofessional also extremely rude, food is never fresh or hot.
If I had the option I would’ve given u -7 stars not even a one.
And let me not begin with how bad and unhelpful customer service is. App deleted and never ever reinstalled.

title: Excellent Service
review: Very efficient and fast process from order through to delivery.

title: Good
review: Thanks for everything, but why sometimes you canceled my order while I did not !?

title: Comment
review: Drivers always late with cold food it make my stomach sick  I did try it couple times but they always deliver my food in the last second and sometimes after the time is over so

title: The worst costumer services ever!
review:
Useless costumer services and you can’t find help if you faced an issue with your order.
Also, recently they have hidden restaurants locations although it’s my right as a costumer to choose what’s best for me.
Account and and app have been removed for better options and guess what there are plenty!

title: Was good
review: It used to be a good application with good service. Now many requests don’t get accepted so it gets me to order multiple times to get what I need. Just to be fair I’ve never faced any problems to refund when I cancel the orders.

title: I will never deal with this app anymore!
review: The app is full of bugs and problems mainly in the tracking map, and they are even not trying to fix it. Also, punch of thieves delivery agents. I deleted the app completely and I recommend to anyone to do so. There are other few better options available.

title: Irresponsible behavior of HungerStation ruined my night!
review: After charging the order and waiting for almost two hours the ordered got cancelled. HungerStation should not make commitments if they cannot fulfill it. The worst part is that HungerStation was totally unapproachable during this ordeal. Even I tried to open the ticket and contact them but no avail. NEVER ORDERING AGAIN!!

title: Service desk response
review:
The service desk response in instant massaging is very slow it takes more than 10mins and you make us to wait and keep the phone open till the agent respond.

I wish if your app integrates with WhatsApp or email for better response.

title: Extremely Terrible Customer Experience
review:
Terrible customer experience with payment, refund, and support. Customer Support is outsourced to another Arabic country who only respond to your support tickets by pointless pre-made templates over and over again. There is NO CONTACT NUMBER!

A vastly vastly vastly inferior app to other delivery apps. Strange, considering the huge customer base.

title: Useless search
review: You can only search for restaurant name, not by any food. Useless feature

title: Mention
review: There is no way to contact with customer service .. if some places late to receive the order , some places take more than 40 min to accept the order !!

title: Doesnt work
review: when i try to go to cart it loads for ever and when it actually loads (which is rarely) i cant press the checkout button. Fix Your App i can’t even order this has been a problem for me for years and i have to ask my younger siblings to order for me as i am unable to

title: Amazing
review: Amazing App and user friendly. It would be great to have the option of repeating any of the previous orders.

title: Need Improvement
review:
Lockdown time they are very worst service. Driver was taken too many order at same time in same restaurant and he took more than 2 hrs to deliver the food.
No cancellation and no customer contact.

title: The app does not allow me to change language
review: I have tried multiple time to change my preferred language from Arabic to English and it says close the app and reopen for the language conversion but every time I reopen the app the language is still Arabic.
Fast and great service this is my first time ordering and I got it in less then 10 mins

title: Check your drivers once in a while
review: I have used the app a-lot in the past with no problem but last 10 orders maybe i had 8 problems with them either it’s short a burger or it’s soo late and how they fix it ? They give you the burger money back but u know what i am still hungry

title: The time i have problems with them or the system much more than my orders😊
review: Even though its one of the first delivery apps but its the Worst delivery app

title: Some enhancements to be added
review:
Greeting,
The application is perfect and would like to add some items to the users

More locations to be saved and named by the user as he wants 

Favorite restaurant list to the user to be easily tracked and reached by the user for the favorite places for him, instead of searching in the large list in the application.

Thx..,

title: One of the worst food delivery app!!!
review: I ordered food from a restaurant, when i received i told to the driver that this is not the items that i ordered. The driver just simply said this is not my problem, its restaurant mistake or contact hungerstation. When i tried to contact customer service, the app keep putting me on hold 😡😡

title: Restaurants not included
review: Some restaurants are not included other applications have all kind of restaurants

title: Delivery issue
review:
I’ve tried the new order that call it fazhaa 
And I’ve ordered 4 times and none of them I got it also , the last time they took my money and they didn’t give me anything, once I took to the delivery he told me hanguer station stoped the order how ever I haven’t received anything, where is the justice?

title: Scammers
review:
1- their drivers are so faaaaaar from professionalism 
2- what they usually do is to give you a free or 5 riyal delivery and they get it back from you from increasing the actual menus so make sure to check the real menu and their menu to just make sure that they are real thief’s 
3- i hope there is a 0 star to give

title: Mr. Hussain
review: Great App, but sometimes the driver takes too long to deliver because he delivers more than one order

title: Not able to contact
review:
I got a problem where the driver said that the restaurant didn’t receive the order. 

I am rating this a one because no zero

Also rating zero because there is no number or quick way to contact the app support to resolve this issue

title: You are so greedy
review: You are so greedy and you make two orders at the same time one of them got delayed I am the victim here I'm going to delete the application I'm gonna make every single one of my family quit application we're gonna move to another one I wish there was zero star for you.

title: Give my money back!
review: Yesterday I contacted driver that The location read is wrong then customer care called me then He can cancel the order then I will get the refund so I agreed then now they are telling me I will not get it. I ordered here many times but after this happened. I will not order again.

title: Insane amount of notifications
review: An insane, indescribable amounts of notifications that hammers your phone day and night forced me to delete your app and open the app store to write this 1 star review and believe me if there is something lower, I would’ve grant it to you. Shame on your marketing team with their cheap, uncreative tactics. 👎👎👎

title: Worst delivery app
review: I have been using it for year and nothing changed, it’s still had very bad delivery experience, food almost always arrives late and cold, customer service are like robots who do not deal with the complain properly and don’t offer a decent compensation, never using if again.

title: Language
review: Why i cannot change language to English

title: Awful Customer Service and even worse drivers
review: Never had a single good experience with this app not a driver have taken my order without yelling at me or whoever is ordering no manners whatsoever and moreover there isn’t an easy facilitated way to complain, no number, no designated place in the app at all

title: Bad service and definitely worst app
review: After you place your order and pay the money, literally NO ONE CARES “customer service” actually there is NONE. They shut the order process and there is no one to call or even track. Never using this app again

title: Upset
review: It is the worst app i have ever used. Since March 2020 i have cancelled one of my orders and yet they did not pay me back my money !! + they annoy you with too way much adds in your netofication center!! Like every Fu*** day !! I would rocommend to use Jahez for the time been at least i can pay when I receive my food !!

title: Delivery take forever ; Poor customer service
review:
Most of their drivers take three or four orders together and thus you have to wait forever to deliver your order.
Their customer service is horrifying. Once you paid by card be sure that they wont help you in any way.

title: Great app, but...
review:
The app is great and the UI improvements were impressive. I would have given it a higher rating if it wasn't for the advertisement notification spam

Now i'm getting more notification spam, at least twice a day....

title: Cancaling
review:
Its happened frequently 
The Resturant contact me after submitting the order for something i order not available and must choose  substitute 

And tried to cancel it by the app or united number and that not available !

title: Good, but!
review: When your order arrives missing some times the app customer support add the amount in the wallet and it is valid for one month! That is for the benefit of the app owner not the customer! I consider it stealing somehow

title: Rude driver
review: We should have the option to rate the driver and the ability to change the driver with less starts ,today didn't receive my order because of rude driver and I didn't find a way to raise my concern about him.

title: worst customer service
review: I don’t recommend at all the app , they don’t know what they’re doing they don’t care about you or your order , u better use similar apps  and not use hungerstation , their prices are hire than the restaurants prices and  they pay u an expensive delivery fees !!!!

title: Customer service
review: Customer service is very bad. If your order is missing items or has wrong items they just compensate you with 10 SAR that you can use for one month only even though your missing items worth more. Go to Jahez it’s better

title: Complaint tickets
review: Complaint ticket is not working for latest update

title: What an amazing App
review:
First time to use especially in Ramadan, amazing how easy and to the point...
Great to be using this wonderful app.

title: Love you
review: Always love who brings you food, i do but you unfortunately take advantage of your reputation by increasing the prices without making it clear to everyone 🙂

title: Ljiska and Teki
review: After accepting the order, the driver, when he found out that the distance was 17 km, did not want to deliver it to us (we paid for both the order and delivery) and said that the call center would call us.  We waited for 2 hours, no one called us, no money was returned to us.  “Maestro Pizza” Team ARE NOT PROFESSIONAL!!!

title: Tips
review: Please add the option to tip the driver using digital wallet (apple pay or credit card).

title: The worst Customer Service Ever

title: كيف تصبح افشل تطبيق؟ اسأل هنقرستيشن وفريق تطويره
review:
برنامج ماقد خيب ظني بفشله كان رائد والحين اسوأ تطبيق بالحياة، اسباب كثير راح اعددها بس اولا وين تروح اذا راح هنقرستيشن؟ تطبيق جاهز وتمت البديل الافضل. تمت سعر مقبول مقابل خدمه اقل سوء من هنا الف مره، اما جاهز سعر مقابل خدمه جيدة جدا واحيانا يوصل لك مجانا بعد ويوصل بسرعة ماتحلم فيها!! وهذا كلها يفقدها هالتطبيق لا سعر ولا جودة ولا توصيل ولا بطيخ.

١- عادي تشوف المندوب يفرفر في طلبك بالخريطة يوصل كم طلب معك ولا مدري وش السالفة صراحة ماودي اظلم احد بس دايم تصير
٢- تشوف المندوب جاي ومعه واحد بالسيارة، تصير كثير. 
٣- تأخير بالساعاااااات خصوصا اذا دفعت ابل بي او شبكة واتوقع معروف السبب😂، حتى بالكاش بس غير فلكي مثل كذا. 
٤- غلاء بالتوصيل غير مبرر، ماعندي مشكلة ارفع سعرك للي تبي بس على الاقل قدم خدمة.
٥- نظافة سواقين سيء ولا معهم تجهيزات عكس جاهز اللي مجهز لسواقينه حافظات حراره للاكل وغيره.
٦- لسلامتك النفسيه وكل شي اسحب عليه.

title: اوسخ تطبيق .
review:
التطبيق هذا اوسخ وانصب تطبيق، عروضهم خبيثه جداً، يعنى يطلع الى في جيبك مهما تكون ، بسبب عروضهم الي هى اساسا ، شبكة صيد
حذف وراح احذف اي حساب فى جوالات العائله.

title: تعويض هنقر  غير مستفاد منه

title: تطبيق سيء
review: من أسوء التطبيقات من جميع النواحي، خدمة سيئه وسياسات سيئه وإدارة ودعم فني سيء.. سويت طلب من مطعم قريب لبيتي "نفس شارع بيتي" واخذ 15 دقيقة وطلع الطلب وجلس اكثر من 50 دقيقه يلف حواري واحياء الرياض كلها.. وتواصلت مع المندوب طلع ماخذ معه اكثر من طلبين غير طلبي. تواصلت مع الدعم على امل انهم يقدرون العملاء حيث اني من الناس اللي مستحيل ياكل اكل بارد او باهت، طلبت منهم يلغون الطلب قالوا بنلغيه بس فلوسك ما ترجع، قلت لهم الحكايه كامله ومحادثتي مع المندوب وتأكيده بانه ماخذ اكثر من طلب وبرضو سألت الدعم اذا كانت سياسات التطبيق تسمح بان المندوب ياخذ اكثر من طلب وكان الجواب بالتأكيد! يعني معقوله ندفع فلوس لخدمات سيئه زي كذا؟ أستخدم التطبيق من 2018 ومشارك فيه كتاجر وكشخص، تم اغلاق الاشتراك مع مطعمي وايضاً تم حذف التطبيق.

title: اسواء مطعم
review:
Hungristation اسواء برنامج توصيل طلبات 
اولا: غالي 
ثانيا: يتاخرو في استرجاع الفلوس(يعني لو ما
معاك فلوس غير مبلغ معين لا تطلب من عندهم)
ثالثا: يعطيك انو المطعم مفتوح و يطلع المطعم مقفل و يرجعو يردو عليكم بعد نص ساعة الى ٤٠ دقيقة يقلك معليش نحنى حنرجعلك فلوسك بعد ٢٤ ساعة و ما حنقدر نجيب الطلب لانو طلع المطعم مقفل

title: المناديب يعملون على اكثر من تطبيق مما يأخر الطلبات
review:
اغلبيه مناديب التطبيق يعملون على تطبيقات اخرى ويقومون بتوصيل الطلبات خلال توصيل طلبك مما يسبب التاخير في الطلب ويصل بارد 
تم رفع شكوى وتم الاتصالا بي ولا حياة لمن تنادي 
موظفي الرد مبرمجين على الاعتذار و إرجاع مبلغ التوصيل دون محاسبه المندوب او مرقابتهم.

title: اسوء برنامج واسوء تجربة
review:
اسوء تجربة واسوء مندوب انسحبت فلوسي و مندوبكم اللي رقمه 0540344502 ضيع من وقتي 45 دقيقه وانا اشوفه في الخريطه يروح اكثر من مكان غير مكان الطلب
وما اتصل علي انتظر انا اتصل عليه في الاخير يقول رحت لقيت المطعم مغلق!!!!!! 
ويوم الواحد يبغى يشتكي عندكم وتعطونه "تذاكر" في الاخير ما تسوي شيء ويقول فشل في ارسال التقيم؟؟؟ 
يعني الواحد كيف يشتكي؟ 
شوفوا لكم حل مع خدمة العملاء السيئه والمندوبين الاسوء.

title: سيء سيء جدااااا
review: على قد ماكل الناس حذروني منه في سحب الفلوس والوجبة ماتوصل وكنت اطنش واقول لا وادفع كاش وتجيني لحد عندي بس بالبطاقة لمن دفعت ماوصلني الاكل والمندوب سوداني يماطلني ويتريق عليا واخذ الاكل والموقع اخذو الفلوس والابلكيشن مانقدر نتصل على اي احد الى اي مدى في الاستهتار والنصب والاحتيال على الناس وصلتو ؟؟؟؟ كيف تطبيق مصرح من وزارة الاتصالات والانظمة المعلوماتية يعامل العملاء باأدنى الاساليب والاستهتار كيف اوصل لحقي المندوب يقول مالي صلاح اتواصلي مع الموقع الموقع ارسلت الف مذكرة يعني شكوى ولا اي شيء وصلني لازم الابليكشن ينقفل في اسرع وقت حقيقي نصصصصصب على العملاء من الابليكشن والمندوبين اللي يشتغلوا وماحسكت علىً حقي لو كان ريال واحد حطلعه منكم بالقانون والحق 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

title: أسوا تطبيق  توصيل في السعوديه
review:
لا انصح التعامل معا هاذا التطبيق السيئ جداً في جميع خدماته من خدمة عملاء  متدنية جدا جدا. وتطبيق يغافل العميل فقط يهمهم دفع الفلوس 
انا حصلت لي نفس مشكله ٣ مرات 
اطلب طلبيه وادفع الفلوس اون لاين وبعد ساعه يجيني تم توصيل الطلب  والطلب لم يصلني ابدا   ولا يوجد اي رقم للتواصل معا المندوب ولا رقم للتواصل معا خدمه العملاء من التطبيق فقط ترفع شكوى والى الان ٣ ايام وانا رافع شكوى بالتطبيق ولم يتم. الرد عليا 🙂

title: اسواء تطبيق توصيل
review:
من اسواء تطبيقات التوصيل 
سيء جدا ورضى العميل هو اخر هم لدرجة اذا جيت تبي تكلم الدعم الفني طبيعي جدا تاخذ ٣-٥ ساعات حتى احد يرد عليك

التطبيق كلها اخطاء استخدم كوبون خصم وما يخصم لي اي شي لهدرجة مستغفلين العملاء ؟ 

الاكل دايم يتاخر يعني طبيعي يقلك مدة التوصيل نصف ساعه ويجيك طلبك بعد ساعه ونص وماكول نصه وبارد

المنيوهات حقت المطاعم ملخبطه جدا يعني الكلام المكتوب مو نفس الشي الي في الصوره 

ما راح استخدم التطبيق مره ثانيه ابدا وراح انصح كل الي اعرفهم يمسحونه لانه تطبيق سيء جدا 
ما همني سعودي ولا مو سعودي تطبيقك سيء وانت ما همك الا الربح السريع لا اهتمام بالعملاء ولا غيره

title: اغلاط كثيرة
review: والله التطبيق صراحتا في البداية معي كان مرة ممتاز بس كل ما طلبت منه اكثر صرت الاحظ اغلاط اكثر يا الطلب يجي متأخر يا بعض الاصناف من الطلب ما يجيك يا الطلب بكبره يكون غلط ولما تطلب المساعدة منهم يحطونك في قائمة انتظار يتوقعون منك تطفش و تروح والله خذولني صراحتا اخر مرة رح استخدمه يعطيكم العافية.

title: Haifa
review: يكذبون باسعار المنيو تجيك اغلى من المطعم نفسه تطبيق سيء واتمنى يلتفتون له ويلغونه

طلبت مرتين في نفس اليوم و ما وصلني اي الطلب 
اول مره طلبت من قسم الفطور و دقو عليا بعد ٤٠ دقيقه انه خلص وقت الفطور و لغو الطلب 

جيت اطلب ثاني عامل التوصيل وصل الطلب لشقة ثانيه واخذوه عندهم و اكلم العامل يقولي تم التوصيل اخذته بنت صغيره قلتله كو نحنا و رجع اخذه منهم و انا رفضت استلم الطلب بسبب كورونا اكيد ما راح استلمه  

جدًا سيئين يعني لو في اقل من نجمة 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

تاخر طلبي لمدة ساعه ونصف والمطعم يبعد عني خمس دقائق

review: ماخذين مني زياده فلوس حول 170 ريال و رفعت مشكلتي ولا احد رد علي للحين بس يقولون راح يتواصلون القسم المختص معك ، وفوق هذا الرصيد اللي بالمحفظه ياخذونها قبل ما يخلص وقتها ! و يشيلون التاريخ حقها بس انا اصور الشاشه بكل شي وعندي تاريخ ان سحبو حتى الفلوس اللي داخل المحفظه قبل وقتها ، للاسف الموضوع صار فيه استغلال  ، غير متعاونين ، مافي رقابه على المناديب ، التطبيق صار سيء للاسف و صار فيه غيره افضل بكثير و ارخص

لن أطلب من خلالهم مرة أخرى!

title: تطبيق جدا جدا سيء و غير نزيه
review:
التطبيق يعرض منتجات المطاعم بأسعار غالية جدا عن الموجود في المحل ، و فوق كذا ياخذ رسوم توصيل مرتفعه. 

خدمة العملاء لديهم معدومة ، من الصعب الرد عليك الا بعد انتظار طويل جدا جدا .

لا انصح باستخدام التطبيق ، في انخفاض كبير في مستوى تشغيل التطبيق عن السابق.

استخدمت تطبيق اخر اسهل 
اتمنى تبان حالة المطعم من الخارج اذا مفتوح او معلق او مشغول
و يكون فيه خانه اختيار الترتيب المطاعم حسب المفتوح و المغلق و يكون ابجدي و اذا انتهت قائمة المفتوح تكتبون المغلق بالابجدي كمان او الطريقة اللي يختارها العميل
المهم فالفرز في الصفحة الرئيسية يبدأ بالمطاعم المفتوحة و بعده المطاعم المغلقة 
وبعد تكتبون سعر التوصيل نفس زمان

مثلا طلب من شاورمر عربو 6 قطع

سعرها بالمطعم : 26 ﷼ 
وفوق هذا اخذ توصيل : 19 ﷼

وطلبت من ماكدونالدز وكان السعر تقريبا 230 ﷼ مع التوصيل عن طريق هانقرستيشن ومن فضل ربي علق التطبيق وما قدرنا نطلب منه وحولنا لتطبيق جاهز الطلب كامل مع توصيله ما وصل 190 ﷼

title: لو فيه اقل من النجمه حطيت

اسوء تطبيق توصيل 
الي يوصلون الطلبات مافيه اي احترافيه 
والطلبات من المطاعم تجي مختلفه 
انا ع فكره ادفع بالابل باي
اول موقف ( ينزل السائق طلبي عند بيت الجيران يقول روحي خوذيه انتي!! وادق ويرفض المكالمه )
الموقف الثاني ( اطلب من مطعم يجي طلب من مطعم ثاني !! وبرضو ادق ع السائق يقولي انا مالي دخل ارجع ارفع طلب ع التطبيق يعطيني الموظف رقم مندوب اتواصل معه ادق عليه مايرد!! )
هذه المواقف اللي ذكرتها بين عشرات المواقف اللي صارت لي و على كثر ماارفع شكاوي الا انهم يردون اننا نتمنى نخدمك المره الجايه بشكل افضل و بالعكس من جرف لدحديره 
اتمنى انهم يحسنون من انفسهم ..

title: What a waste
review:
كبداية بالنسبة للتطبيق برمجياً وجودة ممتاز، 
لكن هنقرستيشن كإدارة ونظام سيئين لابعد درجة، خدمة العملاء مالهم أي فايدة تذكر والمناديب دايم يتأخرون بدون آلية للتعويض عن التأخير، بالإضافة لانهم بسمحون للمندوب بإستلام اكثر من طلب بنفس التوصيل بمعنى اخر همهم خدمة العميل، لذلك اذا انت تقدر وقتك وفلوسك وفرها واطلب من التطبيقات الثانية، جاهز، كريم، تويو، كلها تطبيقات اثبتت وقاعدة تثبت نفسها بمرور الوقت مو زي خوينا الاصفر هذا.

title: اسعار عاليه،خدمة عملاء غير موجوده،وبيانات بطاقتك الائتمانيه في خطر
review: مستخدم قديم للبرنامج،للاسف موخرا اسعار البرنامج زادت بشكل مهول،موبس سعر التوصيل،حتى سعر الوجبه نفسها بالبرنامج اغلى من الواقع،الطلب من خلال البرنامج اصبح يستهلك مبالغ كبيره،وفي المقابل مافيه خدمة عملاء ولا اهتمام بالعميل ،والمصيبه الجديده هي ان البطاقة الائتماني اللي استخدمها بالبرنامج تم اختراقها،بالبدايه اعتقدت ان الاختراق تم من موقع،لكن للاسف حدثت لفرد اخر بالعايله،ومايستخدم البطاقه الا بهنقر ستيشن فقط،وبرضوا المخترق استخدم البطاقات للشراء من نفس الموقع.
تطبيق وخدمة سيئة جداً الطلب يتأخر ويوصل بارد ورسوم توصيل مرتفعه مدري على وش ،لو فيه نص نجمة حطيت

title: ممتاز
review: حلو بس لو يكون بدون فلوسس توصيل بيصير احلا🌚

اسوا تطبيق توصيل اكثر من مره يصير موقف اول مره جاني الطلب من كنتاكي وصخ و ملعق فيه علك ثاني مره طلبت كنتاكي جلست ساعتين في الطريق وهو دايم ما ياخذ ذا الوقت و يوم جيت اقيم طلعني و هذي المره الثالثه طلبت كودو و لاني في قاعده عسكريه ما يدخلون فيها اليمنين على الرغم ان اللوكيشن كان باين انها القاعده و قبل الطلب يوم وصل قال اطلعي خذه !!!!!!! الطلب ما وصلني قالو دقي لاسترجاع المبلغ قاعده ادخل البيانات فوق العشر مرات اسوي اتمام يطلعني اااااسووووواااء تطبيق توووووصيلللل 👎👎👎👎

title: أسعار غير صحيحة
review: خدمة سيئة بعد استلام الطلب لا يتم التواصل مع العميل ولا يتم الرد بعد تقديم شكوى ! ويقدم لي المطعم فاتورة بغير سعر فاتورة التطبيق بفارق ٤٠ ريال ولم يتم الرد علي ولا إرجاع المتبقي إلى اليوم مع مضي ٢٤ ساعة على تقديم الشكوى! لماذا التلاعب وعدم المصداقية ! تقييمي سيء للغاية

يقللون من التوصيل كأنه عرض منهم واخرته يرفعون سعر الطلب ؟ تتكلمون عن عروض او ايش بضبط ؟ توصيل 9 ولازم تطلبون بـ 35 او التوصيل 22 وتطلبون فوق15 انا اشوفه نصب وحتيال لا عروض ولا هاذي وهذيك اذا الي باكله هو نفسه السايق

title: تطبيق سيء
review: تطبيق سيء خدمة عملاء سيئة .. تكررت عمليات تنقيص الطلب من كذا مكان سواء عبر الماركت او المطاعم ومماطلة بإرجاع المبلغ قاربت الاسبوع منذ اخر طلب ولم يعيدوا لي المبلغ الذي دفعته والمشكلة قبلها ب١٢ ساعة تسبب احد الموظفين بمشاكل لانه يكذبني واعتذروا مني وكرروا ذات الأمر معي مرة أخرى ولم يعيدوا لي ريال واحد وقمت بحذف التطبيق ولن أتعامل معه مرة أخرى حتى لو لم يتوفر غيره .. هذا عدا الطلبات المليئة بالحشرات وعندما تقدمت برفع بلاغ اعادوا لي قيمة الطلب فقط وكأن صدمتي وصحتي قيمتها ٣٠ ريال !! مهازل لا تغتفر

title: لا يوجد دعم فني

title: يفوز باسوأ تطبيق على الإطلاق
review:
١- عند الطلب يظهر لك مدة توصيل معينه وبعد الطلب تتغير مدة التوصيل وتزيد المدة.
٢- التاخير ايضاً عن المدة الزايدة ومايوصل بالوقت.
٣- فريق الدعم بمشاكل التوصيل غير متعاون ابداً.
٤- بعد الطلب والانتطار من 45 دقيقه الى ساعة يرسلوا لك ان المطعم ماقبل طلبك؛ ومرة انتظرت ساعتين حرفياً بدون زيادة او نقصان وقالي ان المطعم ماقبل طلبك.. وكان وقت الطلب الساعه 11 مساءً وانتظرت الى 1 ووصلتني رسالة الغاء الطلب.. 

انا حذفت التطبيق من ٤ سنوات بعد ماطلع جاهز الافضل طبعاً لان هذا جداً سيء ولو فيه تقييم اقل من نجمة اعطيه، ورجعت حملته قبل كم شهر وهذي المرة الاخيرة اللي اطلب منه وسيتم حذف البرنامج من جديد.

title: النصب والاحتيال
review:
قولتهم جيبو وجبتين يعني مع بطاطس وعصيرات ماجابو الا لنا برجرين وبطاطس واحدة طيب فين المشروبات الغازية وبطاطس مدامها وجبة وفوقها كذا اول يوم بالتطبيق كتبولي رسوم التوصيل مجانا وفوقها ماجابو نفس طلبي ونصبو علي 
اليوم بحذف التطبيق للأبد ولا راح اطلب منهم مرة ثانية حتئ المدير صوته متقطع وماينسمع ولا يحترم الزبون حسبي الله ونعم الوكيل ٧٣ ريال كلها حرام فيهم 
بحذف التطبيق للأبد ولا بفكر فيه للأبد 
مسوين دعاية كذب والله ابليس يصفق لكم بجهنم

review:
التطبيق هذا مثير للشفقة 
كل شي فيه سيئ 
اسعار التوصيل اعلى من باقي التطبيقات 
العروض اغلبها مخادع ( مكتوب توصيل مجاني واذا دخلت على المطعم يكتبون ان التوصيل مجاني اذا دفعت الحد الادنى للطلبات) 
وطبعا خدمة العملاء ما ابالغ لو قلت اسوأ خدمة عملاء بالشرق الاوسط.
ممثلين خدمة العملاء لا اسلوب ولا اهتمام ولا توفير حلول للعميل بالعكس تتصل عليهم وتحصل اسلوب متخلف وحلول غير مرضية 
عموما البدائل كثيرة 
جاهز ، ToYou و … كلها افضل من هالتطبيق 
والله حتى ما يستاهل تعطيه فرصة

title: سائق سيء جداً و قليل ادب
review:
تواصلت مع عامل التوصيل لاوضح له طريقة السداد 
و اتأكد من موقعه ، 
تم الرد علي بأسلوب سيء جداً و ان المطعم مغلق و الطلب سيقوم بتوصيلة بعد انتهاء الصلاة ، مع العلم ان المطعم قبل الطلب و قام بتحضيرة ، و عامل التوصيل لم يوضح لي هذا الامر بطريقة جيدة ، بل على العكس تماماً ، حيث أبلغني ان هذي ليست بمشكلتة بل مشكلتي انا 
على الرغم من اسلوبي الجيد معه ، 
و تم تبليغه بالغاء الطلب و انني لم اعد اريدة 
فقام باغلاق الهاتف بينما كنت اتحدث له ، 

و بعد مرور ٤٥ دقيقة 
تواصل معي و ابلغني انة وصل للموقع 
حيث اخبرتة باني الغيت الطلب و يجب تحسين اسلوبك مع زبائن التطبيق
لم يعجبة الامر ، و اغلق الهاتف بينما اتحدث مرة أخرى .
بعد التحديث راحت طريقة الدفع بالأبل پاي وماقدرت اضيفها بأي طريقه للأسف..

title: اسواء خدمة عملاء وبرنامج نصاب
review:
فوق انه مرات يوم احاسب بفلوس المحفظه بس تتكنسل عملية الدفع وفلوس محفظتي تختفي يجيك مطعم تستناس ساعه اخرتها يقولولك الاصناف مافي وغير طلبك ولا نرجع فلوسك يعني لو الصنف مافي حطو ان مافي لاتخلوني ادفع فلوسي شبكه واخرتها ترجع لي بوقت متاخر .
يعني ارجع من دوامي هلكان ونعسان وجيعان بس دحين بنام بدون اكل تشان الفلوس الي المفروض طالب فيها دحين حتجيني في وقت ثاني بسبب ارحاع الطلب 
وذا مو اول مرا يسووها بس انا سكت في الاولى عشان قدرت ادبر نفسي وقتها بس دحين جيعان وماني قادر اكل بسبب ذا البرنامج .
